welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ken Caryl! This scenic city is known for its beautiful mountain views and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ken Caryl has to offer."

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing the ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: A Gates
terminals.description: The first concourse of Denver International Airport, primarily serving United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: B Gates
terminals.description: The second concourse of Denver International Airport, primarily serving Southwest Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: C Gates
terminals.description: The third concourse of Denver International Airport, primarily serving Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Westin Hotel
terminals.description: A hotel located within the airport, offering convenient accommodations for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
